ability name, no caps at all, with space.name: name of ability, with caps here please
ability name, no caps at all, with space.description: the official description that is used in games, use capital letter and full stop
ability name, no caps at all, with space.effect: bulbapedia's insight on the actual effect - you'll need to do this manually i guess - also caps and full stop please

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
aerilate.effect: Affected moves now receive a 20% power boost.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
aftermath.effect: When a Pokémon with this Ability faints due to damage from a move that makes contact, the attacking Pokémon takes damage equal to ¼ of its own maximum HP. This Ability will not activate if a Pokémon with Damp is on the field.

air lock.name: Air Lock
air lock.effect: During extremely harsh sunlight, heavy rain, and a mysterious air current, even if a Pokémon is negating the effects of weather with Air Lock, the moves Sunny Day, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, and Hail will still fail if used, and the Abilities Drought, Drizzle, Sand Stream, and Snow Warning will still fail to activate. However, all other effects of these weather conditions are negated by Air Lock.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
analytic.effect:
If a Pokémon with Analytic executes its move after the Pokémon it originally targeted has already acted this turn, the power of its move is increased by 30%. Using a move and switching to another Pokémon count as having acted, while Mega Evolving, shifting, or the charging phase of Focus Punch do not.

In a Triple Battle, this means that if the Pokémon with Analytic is targeting a Pokémon in a flank position that chooses to switch with its ally in the middle, its move's power will always be normal when it attacks the Pokémon that is shifted into the flank position; but if the Pokémon with Analytic targets a Pokémon in the middle whose ally on a flank chooses to shift into the middle position, its move's power still depends on whether the Pokémon that was in the middle (and is now on a flank) has acted when the Pokémon with Analytic uses its move.

anger point.name: Anger Point
anger point.description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
anger point.effect:
Generation IV
When a Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a critical hit, Anger Point maximizes its Attack stat by raising it to +6 stages (regardless of its current stage).
Anger Point will activate even if the Pokémon's substitute is hit.
Generation V onward
Anger Point no longer activates if the Pokémon's substitute is hit.

aroma veil.name: Aroma Veil
aroma veil.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

aura break.name: Aura Break
aura break.description: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

battle armor.name: Battle Armor
battle armor.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

battle bond.name: Battle Bond
battle bond.description: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon's bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

beast boost.name: Beast Boost
beast boost.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

big pecks.name: Big Pecks
big pecks.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

cheek pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheek pouch.description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in sunshine.

clear body.name: Clear Body
clear body.description: Prevents the Pokémon’s stats from being lowered.

color change.name: Color Change
color change.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the foe’s move.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.description: It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Boosts the Sp.Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

cursed body.name: Cursed Body
cursed body.description: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

cute charm.name: Cute Charm
cute charm.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.description: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

dark aura.name: Dark Aura
dark aura.description: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.description: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.description: Halves Attack and Special Attack below 50% HP.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

delta stream.name: Delta Stream
delta stream.description: Eliminates weather effects and eliminates weaknesses of Flying-type Pokémon.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

download.name: Download
download.description: Adjusts power according to the foe’s lowest defensive stat.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.description: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.

drought.name: Drought
drought.description: The Pokémon makes it sunny if it is in battle.

dry skin.name: Dry Skin
dry skin.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

early bird.name: Early Bird
early bird.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

effect spore.name: Effect Spore
effect spore.description: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.

electric surge.name: Electric Surge
electric surge.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

emergency exit.name: Emergency Exit
emergency exit.description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

fairy aura.name: Fairy Aura
fairy aura.description: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

flame body.name: Flame Body
flame body.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the foe.

flare boost.name: Flare Boost
flare boost.description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.

flash fire.name: Flash Fire
flash fire.description: Powers up Fire-type moves if hit by a fire move.

flower gift.name: Flower Gift
flower gift.description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

flower veil.name: Flower Veil
flower veil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.description: Determines what moves the foe has.

friend guard.name: Friend Guard
friend guard.description: Decreases damage inflicted against ally Pokémon.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.description: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

full metal body.name: Full Metal Body
full metal body.description: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

grass pelt.name: Grass Pelt
grass pelt.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

grassy surge.name: Grassy Surge
grassy surge.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.description: Restores any held Berry after the turn on which it is used.

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

honey gather.name: Honey Gather
honey gather.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

hyper cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hyper cutter.description: Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered.

ice body.name: Ice Body
ice body.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Ignores Light Screen, Reflect, and Safeguard.

innards out.name: Innards Out
innards out.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

inner focus.name: Inner Focus
inner focus.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

iron barbs.name: Iron Barbs
iron barbs.description: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

iron fist.name: Iron Fist
iron fist.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: Raises Attack when hit by Dark-type moves.

keen eye.name: Keen Eye
keen eye.description: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

leaf guard.name: Leaf Guard
leaf guard.description: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

lightning rod.name: Lightning Rod
lightning rod.description: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves and then raise Sp.Atk.

limber.name: Limber
limber.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

liquid ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquid ooze.description: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.

liquid voice.name: Liquid Voice
liquid voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

long reach.name: Long Reach
long reach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magic bounce.name: Magic Bounce
magic bounce.description: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.

magic guard.name: Magic Guard
magic guard.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

magma armor.name: Magma Armor
magma armor.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

marvel scale.name: Marvel Scale
marvel scale.description: Boosts Defense if there is a status problem.

mega launcher.name: Mega Launcher
mega launcher.description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

minus.name: Minus
minus.description: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus.

misty surge.name: Misty Surge
misty surge.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

mold breaker.name: Mold Breaker
mold breaker.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

moody.name: Moody
moody.description: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

motor drive.name: Motor Drive
motor drive.description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Halves damage taken from full HP.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

natural cure.name: Natural Cure
natural cure.description: All status problems are healed upon switching out.

no guard.name: No Guard
no guard.description: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe’s attacks land.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.description: All the Pokémon’s moves become the Normal type.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

own tempo.name: Own Tempo
own tempo.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: Steals attacking Pokémon's held item on contact.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.

poison heal.name: Poison Heal
poison heal.description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

poison point.name: Poison Point
poison point.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.

poison touch.name: Poison Touch
poison touch.description: Has a 30% chance of poisoning Pokémon upon contact when attacking.

power construct.name: Power Construct
power construct.description: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

power of alchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
power of alchemy.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.

prism armor.name: Prism Armor
prism armor.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the same type of the move it is using.

psychic surge.name: Psychic Surge
psychic surge.description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

pure power.name: Pure Power
pure power.description: Boosts the power of physical attacks.

queenly majesty.name: Queenly Majesty
queenly majesty.description: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

quick feet.name: Quick Feet
quick feet.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

rain dish.name: Rain Dish
rain dish.description: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a Dark, Ghost, or Bug move.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon leaving battle.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.description: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.

rks system.name: RKS System
rks system.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

rock head.name: Rock Head
rock head.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

rough skin.name: Rough Skin
rough skin.description: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.

run away.name: Run Away
run away.description: Enables sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

sand force.name: Sand Force
sand force.description: Strengthens Rock, Ground, and Steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.

sand stream.name: Sand Stream
sand stream.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

sand veil.name: Sand Veil
sand veil.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

sap sipper.name: Sap Sipper
sap sipper.description: Absorbs Grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

schooling.name: Schooling
schooling.description: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.

serene grace.name: Serene Grace
serene grace.description: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

shadow shield.name: Shadow Shield
shadow shield.description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

shed skin.name: Shed Skin
shed skin.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

sheer force.name: Sheer Force
sheer force.description: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

shell armor.name: Shell Armor
shell armor.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

shield dust.name: Shield Dust
shield dust.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

shields down.name: Shields Down
shields down.description: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

skill link.name: Skill Link
skill link.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

slush rush.name: Slush Rush
slush rush.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

snow warning.name: Snow Warning
snow warning.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

solar power.name: Solar Power
solar power.description: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

soul-heart.name: Soul-Heart
soul-heart.description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.description: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

speed boost.name: Speed Boost
speed boost.description: The Pokémon’s Speed stat is gradually boosted.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: The Pokémon moves after even slower foes.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

stance change.name: Stance Change
stance change.description: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

static.name: Static
static.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

stench.name: Stench
stench.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

sticky hold.name: Sticky Hold
sticky hold.description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

storm drain.name: Storm Drain
storm drain.description: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.

strong jaw.name: Strong Jaw
strong jaw.description: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.

suction cups.name: Suction Cups
suction cups.description: Negates moves that force switching out.

super luck.name: Super Luck
super luck.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

surge surfer.name: Surge Surfer
surge surfer.description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

sweet veil.name: Sweet Veil
sweet veil.description: Prevents itself and its allies from falling asleep.

swift swim.name: Swift Swim
swift swim.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

tangled feet.name: Tangled Feet
tangled feet.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

tangling hair.name: Tangling Hair
tangling hair.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: Protects against damaging moves from friendly Pokémon.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

thick fat.name: Thick Fat
thick fat.description: Raises resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

tough claws.name: Tough Claws
tough claws.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

triage.name: Triage
triage.description: Gives priority to a healing move.

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: Ignores any change in stats by the foe.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

victory star.name: Victory Star
victory star.description: Raises moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

vital spirit.name: Vital Spirit
vital spirit.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

volt absorb.name: Volt Absorb
volt absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

water absorb.name: Water Absorb
water absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

water bubble.name: Water Bubble
water bubble.description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

water compaction.name: Water Compaction
water compaction.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

water veil.name: Water Veil
water veil.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

weak armor.name: Weak Armor
weak armor.description: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by any move.

white smoke.name: White Smoke
white smoke.description: Prevents the Pokémon’s stats from being lowered.

wimp out.name: Wimp Out
wimp out.description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

wonder skin.name: Wonder Skin
wonder skin.description: Has a 50% chance of protecting against non-damaging moves that inflict major status ailments.

zen mode.name: Zen Mode
zen mode.description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is halved.
